posts.message:
#StartupQuote 

A ‘startup’ is a company that is confused about
1. What its product is.
2. Who its customers are.
3. How to make money.

- Dave McClure

Hack any system (as long as it's in a movie) http://hackertyper.net/ 
Just start typing :)
#StartupQuote Markets comes and go. Good businesses don't.

Please take a sec and vote for our Placeit App we are already Number #1 But we would like to secure our position :) Show some love to Placeit :)

http://www.producthunt.co/

posts.message: Programming is hard work. It’s an intense mental activity. Good programmers think about their work 24/7. They write their most important code in the shower and in their dreams.

Apple Inc. reported that every year a new 150+ million user buy iPhone and iPad, and this is considered a potential market for iPhone and iPad Apps developers .

It's time to start your business and make money !

Start your own mobile App business and make money by creating your own iOS application and upload it to the App store to be available for download globally.

Join us in our next round to learn how to create and sell your App within 50 Hours only.

Pick your seat before 15/1/ 2014
Register now at http://foe.pitechnologies.net/ and get 10% off
Or call us at : 01017473777

Facebook: PiTechnologies

posts.description: The FileSystem APIs give applications the ability to read/write files and directories in a secure, sandboxed file system on a user's local machine.

posts.description: This is a lesson we recently learned the hard way, and if you have (or contribute to) a blog, you might want to read our story so that you never, ever make the same mistake we did.
